page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: HOME LIFE. Village life for home-owner's usually means gardening, one section flowers & grass,usually at the front, vegetable plot and fruit trees & bushes at rear. There are local shows for the dedicated home-gardener, and in these days a deep freeze is as important as an oven, fruit and vegetables being grown for immediate use and to freeze. Many homes have open coal fires and many use an Aga Cooker. Men keep alive skills like Wood-turning & Carving. The women do their own laundry, make preserves, bottlefruit, do the freezing,knit,sew,crochet,make lace, spinning, breed dogs.Cake Stalls & Coffee Mornings are held to raise funds for the Church and charities. Many people have now started making wine using wild flowers and berries. Root vegetables are also used.
